document.full_text: more than 300 applicants submitted 13 comments on twitter in 13 days. the agency chose 32 finalists from that group, who were interviewed for six spots.
document.title: advertising: competing for summer internships, using a twitter contest
lines_and_colors: more than 300 applicants submitted 13 comments on twitter in 13 days. the agency chose 32 finalists from that group, who were interviewed for six spots.
